name: Xplore Technologies Corp.
description: Xplore Technologies Corp. is a leading provider of rugged mobile computing solutions designed for a variety of industries, including field services, public safety, and manufacturing. Established in 1996, Xplore specializes in designing, engineering, and manufacturing durable tablets and mobile devices that can withstand harsh operating environments. The company’s products are built to enhance productivity and efficiency, enabling users to access critical information and applications in real-time, regardless of their location. Xplore's flagship product line includes the XSLATE R12, a rugged tablet that combines powerful computing and a robust design to meet the demands of professionals who work in challenging conditions. The company is committed to innovation, continuously enhancing its product offerings to include advanced features such as touchscreen technology, wireless connectivity, and enhanced security measures. Xplore’s mission is to empower mobile workers with reliable and efficient technology that can withstand the rigors of their work environments, ultimately driving operational success and improving safety. With a dedicated team focused on customer satisfaction, Xplore continues to expand its presence in the rugged computing market, delivering solutions that cater to the evolving needs of its diverse clientele.
